sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtndamknoifm ( KNWLDG_ID , knwldg_ty_code , orgnzt_id , expert_id , emplyr_id , knwldg_nm , knwldg_cn , kwrd , othbc_at , knwldg_evl , colct_de , evl_de , atch_file_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , dsuse_de ) VALUES ( #knwldgId# , #knwldgTyCode# , #orgnztId# , #expertId# , #emplyrId# , #knwldgNm# , #knwldgCn# , #kwrd# , #othbcAt# , #knwldgEvl# , #colctDe# , #evlDe# , #atchFileId# , #frstRegisterId# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #lastUpdusrId# , #lastUpdtPnttm# , #dsuseDe# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtndamknoifm SET knwldg_id = #knwldgId# , knwldg_ty_code = #knwldgTyCode# , orgnzt_id = #orgnztId# , expert_id = #expertId# , emplyr_id = #emplyrId# , knwldg_nm = #knwldgNm# , knwldg_cn = #knwldgCn# , kwrd = #kwrd# , othbc_at = #othbcAt# , knwldg_evl = #knwldgEvl# , colct_de = #colctDe# , evl_de = #evlDe# , atch_file_id = #atchFileId# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# , dsuse_de = #dsuseDe# WHERE knwldg_id = #knwldgId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT knwldg_id , knwldg_ty_code , orgnzt_id , expert_id , emplyr_id , knwldg_nm , knwldg_cn , kwrd , othbc_at , knwldg_evl , colct_de , evl_de , atch_file_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , dsuse_de FROM comtndamknoifm WHERE knwldg_id = #knwldgId#

SELECT knwldg_id , knwldg_ty_code , orgnzt_id , expert_id , emplyr_id , knwldg_nm , knwldg_cn , kwrd , othbc_at , knwldg_evl , colct_de , evl_de , atch_file_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , dsuse_de FROM comtndamknoifm WHERE 1=1
knwldg_id = #searchKeyword#
knwldg_ty_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY knwldg_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtndamknoifm WHERE 1=1
knwldg_id = #searchKeyword#
knwldg_ty_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
